source:
TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_SEQ_00You can't help but notice how awfully busy C'zibho Tia looks─it would be a shame to leave him to his own devices.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_SEQ_00* Cette quête est un événement à durée limitée.

C'zibho Tia a l'air relativement occupé.

source:
TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_SEQ_01C'zibho Tia can barely keep up with the appetites of Costa del Sol's faire-goers, and needs someone to help him prepare servings of battered fish. He informs you that the main ingredient, haddock, can be purchased from a nearby stall. Once you have prepared the battered fish, bring it to C'zibho Tia before he runs out of food to sell.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_SEQ_01Cette quête ne peut être commencée et effectuée que pendant la durée de l'événement saisonnier correspondant. Pour plus de détails, veuillez consulter The Lodestone.

C'zibho Tia vous a demandé de lui apporter . À vos casseroles!

source: TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_SEQ_02<tab>C'zibho Tia is pleased at the battered fish you have delivered him, and relieved that he will not have to turn customers away yet. It seems that he and Espan have a difference of opinion when it comes to what makes a dish important: Espan is a stickler for the quality of the fish, while C'zibho Tia maintains that the quality matters not once the fish is fried. However, the many guests of the Moonfire Faire do not seem to mind either way, and C'zibho Tia asks you to deliver more servings of battered fish once you prepare them.
target: TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez apporté <var 33 ((Item)) 02F2285C0202 /var> à C'zibho Tia, qui a profité de cette occasion pour casser un peu de sucre sur le dos d'Espan. Mais peu importe, il a eu l'air d'apprécier à sa juste valeur le produit que vous lui avez livré.

source: TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_TODO_00<tab>Deliver a serving of battered fish to C'zibho Tia.

TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_CZIBHOTIA_000_000<tab>Ah, so you've weighed your options and decided to help ol' C'zibho Tia, eh? You have my thanks, and I promise it'll be a mite more enjoyable than what Espan would have you do.
target: TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_CZIBHOTIA_000_000<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Bonsoirrr)) ((Bonjourrr)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Bonjourrr)) ((Bonsoirrr)) /var>)) /var>, je vois que tu m'as préférrré à Espan... Tu as bien raison<var 1D /var>! Ce type est une véritable plaie.

source: TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_CZIBHOTIA_000_001<tab>I'm here to fill the stomachs of our lovely faire-goers with battered fish, but so many of us are dealing with the pirates I can barely keep up with demand.
target: TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_CZIBHOTIA_000_001<tab>Mes <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF2285C0302 /var> partent comme des petits pains<var 1D /var>! Il faut dirrre que la panure est frite juste comme il faut<var 1D /var>: ni trop grasse ni trop sèche<var 1D /var>! Elle croustille sous la dent, c'est une merveille. Mais mes commis n'ont pas le temps de s'y consacrer à cause de ces satanés pirrrates<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_CZIBHOTIA_000_002<tab>If you'd like to help, we're always in need of battered fish. You can buy haddock, the main ingredient, from the festive fisher just over there. Bring 'em to me when you're done.
target: TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_CZIBHOTIA_000_002<tab>Tu me rendrrrais un fier service si tu acceptais de cuisiner <var 33 ((Item)) 02F2285C0202 /var> pour moi. Attention cependant, car je n'utilise que <var 33 ((Item)) 0AF232BE0202 /var><var 1D /var>! Mais rassure-toi, tu pourras t'en procurer auprès du pêcheur souriant. Allez, je compte surrr toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_CZIBHOTIA_000_005<tab>We've barely enough battered fish to feed the hungry faire-goers! Bring me any you can before we're forced to turn people away.
target: TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_CZIBHOTIA_000_005<tab>Alors, tu m'as cuisiné <var 33 ((Item)) 02F2285C0202 /var><var 1D /var>? Attention, je le saurai tout de suite si tu as utilisé autre chose que <var 33 ((Item)) 0AF232BE0202 /var><var 1D /var>! Enfin rassure-toi, le pêcheur souriant en vend à deux pas d'ici.

source: TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_CZIBHOTIA_000_020<tab>Marvelous! I'd eat it myself if there weren't so many customers. Espan just doesn't understand the demand─he's likely still fussing over the freshness of the fish. But when you're hungry, it's all the same once it's battered and fried.
target: TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_CZIBHOTIA_000_020<tab>La panure a l'air croustillante à souhait. Je suis prrrêt à parier que c'est un délice<var 1D /var>! Quand je pense qu'Espan ne jure que par la fraîcheur du poisson... alors que bon, une fois le tout passé dans l'huile, plus rien n'a d'importance<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_CZIBHOTIA_000_021<tab>You have my thanks. The Moonfire Faire has no shortage of hungry revelers, so speak to me if you feel like cooking for us again.
target: TEXT_FESSUM102_02125_CZIBHOTIA_000_021<tab>Merci beaucoup, n'hésite pas à m'en apporter d'autrrres<var 1D /var>! Tu sais où me trouver.
